title: Full-Stack Web Development with Django
introduction: Django is a high-level Python web framework that simplifies the process of building web applications. It follows the Model-View-Template (MVT) pattern and emphasizes rapid development.
details: With Django, developers can create feature-rich web applications with built-in admin interfaces, authentication, and database migrations. It provides tools for URL routing, form handling, and template rendering. Learning full-stack web development with Django involves understanding models, views, templates, and integrating with front-end frameworks like React or Vue.js.
